channel.title: FIFA.com - Latest Photos
channel.description: The latest football photos from across the globe provided to you by FIFA.com. Tags: football photo, soccer photo, photo, pics, world cup, fifa world cup, fifa, soccer, football, sport

item.title: Alexander Hleb, new signing of Wolfsburg
item.description: Alexander Hleb, new signing of the German first division Bundesliga football club VfL Wolfsburg, poses for photographers with his jersey at the club's stadium in Wolfsburg on September 7, 2011. Hleb has come from FC Birmingham where he was on loan from FC Barcelona.
item.media:title: Alexander Hleb, new signing of Wolfsburg

item.title: Germany's midfielder Mario Goetze celebrates
item.description: Germany's midfielder Mario Goetze celebrates scoring during the Germany vs Brazil international friendly football match at the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Stuttgart, southern Germany, on August 10, 2011. Germany won the match 3-2.

item.title: President Blatter in Romania, 6 September 2011

item.title: Austrian national football team head coach Dietmar Constantini
item.description: Austrian national football team head coach Dietmar Constantini attends a presser and announces his resignation at the end of the year on September 7, 2011 in Vienna after Austria miss the Euro 2012 qualification. At right Austrian football federation president Leo Windtner.
